prompt: Mismatched, colorful mugs crowded one corner of the counter, near a kettle that was still warm. A cutting board sat where it had been left mid-prep, still dusted with crumbs and the faint scent of garlic. Magnets held a collage of notes and photos on the fridge right by the entrance - reminders, recipes, and a childâ€™s drawing of a rotund cat. Light streamed through the window above the sink, illuminating a pile of dishes yet to be washed.
